Cargar paquete tidyverse y readr
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

Cargar datos
```{r}
library(readr)
ICE2014 <- read_csv("C:/Users/Ingrid/Desktop/Complejidad econÃ³mica/LAB 5/ICE2014.csv")
head(ICE2014)
names(ICE2014)
```

1. Pivotar tabla  "A LO LARGO"
```{r}
t1_PIVOTANTE = ICE2014 %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c("Km,0"   ,   "Km,2"   ,   "Km,4"   ,   "Km,6"   ,   "Km,8"    ,  "Km,10"  ,   "Km,12"  ,   "Km,14"  ,   "Km,16"  ,   "Km,18"   ,  "Km,20" ), names_to = "iteracion", values_to = "ranking")
```

Exportar resultado: tabla ordenada
```{r}
write.csv(t1_PIVOTANTE, file = "ice_CHARTICULATOR.csv")
```
